LanguageData.BedRoll_TSB.label: RimThermoPlas Single Bedroll
LanguageData.BedRoll_TSB.description: A complex bedroll utilising RimThermoPlas for additional heating. It can be rolled up for easy transport, but it is not quite as comfortable as a typical bed. Caravans can use bedrolls while traveling for better sleep.
